metadata.title: CVE-2024-46777 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:udf: Avoid excessive partition lengthsAvoid mounting filesystems where the partition would overflow the32-bits used for block number. Also refuse to mount filesystems wherethe partition length is so large we cannot safely index bits in ablock bitmap.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
